SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM ( SELECT account as deposit_account,deposit_date,SUM(amount) as deposit_amount FROM deposit_cash WHERE 1 = 1 AND `status` = 0 AND confirm_flag = 1
${params.queryCondition}
AND shop_no IN (SELECT shop_no FROM shop WHERE company_no = #{params.companyNo,jdbcType=CHAR})
AND shop_no = #{params.shopNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
and deposit_date >= '${params.startOutDate} 00:00:00'
and deposit_date <= '${params.endOutDate} 23:59:59'
GROUP BY account,deposit_date ) B

SELECT om.order_no,om.shop_no,om.shop_name,'销售' type, om.amount income_amount, op.pay_code,op.pay_name FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_payway op ON om.order_no = op.order_no WHERE 1=1 AND op.pay_code = '01'
UNION ALL SELECT rem.business_no,rem.shop_no,rem.shop_name,'换货' type, rem.amount income_amount, op.pay_code,op.pay_name FROM return_exchange_main rem LEFT JOIN order_payway op ON rem.business_no = op.order_no WHERE 1=1 AND op.pay_code = '01' AND rem.amount > 0
UNION ALL SELECT rem.business_no,rem.shop_no,rem.shop_name,'退货' type, rem.amount income_amount, op.pay_code,op.pay_name FROM return_exchange_main rem LEFT JOIN order_payway op ON rem.business_no = op.order_no WHERE 1=1 AND op.pay_code = '01' AND rem.amount < 0

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(deposit_amount),0) amount FROM cash_transaction_dtl WHERE card_number IN
'${account}'
AND deposit_cash_time >= '${params.startDate} 00:00:00' AND deposit_cash_time <= '${params.endDate} 23:59:59'
